about.biography: Hello, I'm a full-stack / back-end developer passionate about technology and software development, always striving for innovative, scalable, and high-performance solutions.

jobs.title: Systems Analyst
jobs.description: I work in system support, development, and integration, using C#, JavaScript, Python, PostgreSQL, HTML, and CSS to create efficient solutions and automation. I participate in meetings with technical collaborators to ensure alignment and continuous improvement. My responsibilities include technical support, system development and maintenance, integration monitoring, report manipulation, database management, and equipment configuration. I am always looking to optimize processes and deliver scalable, high-impact solutions.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: Responsible for developing scalable web applications using React, Node.js, Express, Docker, and MySQL. I worked on creating interactive user interfaces, building robust APIs, and integrating with databases. I used Docker to optimize development environments and collaborated with the team to ensure high-quality solution delivery.

jobs.title: Software Development Intern
jobs.description: I worked on developing and maintaining web applications using React and Node.js. My responsibilities included creating responsive interfaces, implementing APIs, testing, and debugging code. I collaborated with the team to develop technology solutions and enhance the user experience. This internship gave me a solid understanding of full-stack development practices in a dynamic professional environment.

courses.title: Systems analysis and development
courses.institution: FIAP - Faculdade de Informática e Administração Paulista
